caption:
This photograph captures a colorful roadside billboard welcoming visitors to Clewiston, which it describes as "America's Sweetest Town." The prominent sign highlights local attractions and activities such as flying, golfing, bass fishing, and a bird sanctuary. The composition centers the billboard against a rural backdrop, featuring sprawling fields and a partly cloudy sky. The vivid blue and yellow colors of the sign are eye-catching and create a cheerful, inviting tone.

To the left of the image, there are some dark green trees partially visible, providing a natural border to the scene. Likewise, on the right, the frame edge might suggest that this is a view from a vehicle on a road parallel to the billboard. Below the sign, there's a guardrail, hinting at the proximity of a roadway in front of the sign. This setting suggests that the photograph was taken from a car, capturing a common experience for travelers encountering welcoming signs as they enter new towns.
title: City limits of CLewiston
